question:
A Pendulum Clock, whose pendulum is made up of a steel rod, will become slow if __:
1. Temperature rises
2. Taken to moon
3. Taken from equator to pole
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The length of the pendulum increases if temperature increases and the time period T increases and a pendulum takes more time to complete one oscillation. That is why it becomes slow. As the moon's gravity of about 1/6 of Earth's gravity, and period of a pendulum increases with a decrease in gravity so it will take more time to complete one oscillation. When a pendulum is taken from the equator to the pole, gravity increases, Time period decreases and it will start oscillating faster.
